tool_description:
Introducing our online image converter API: a streamlined, robust solution tailored for all your image conversion needs. Experience lightning-fast transformation across various formats, ensuring your visuals stay sharp and impactful. Make your workflow seamless with our user-friendly service, regardless of the scale and complexity of your tasks.
We support the following formats:
JPG
PNG
SVG
HEIC
WEBP
GIF
AVIF
TIFF
Contact us at support@pixelied.com if you are having difficulties in consuming ...
name: Pixelied Image Converter
title: Pixelied Image Converter

api_list.name: Image to PNG
api_list.description:
Convert Image to **PNG**

Input image file can be (*jpg, jpeg, svg, webp, gif, avif,  tiff,  heic, heif*)

optional_parameters.name: toWidth
optional_parameters.description:
**toWidth** parameter can be set to make the image smaller or larger in width.
If no **toWidth** parameter is set, the image file is converted with no change in width.

optional_parameters.name: toHeight
optional_parameters.description:
**toHeight** parameter can be set to make the image smaller or larger in height.
If no **toHeight** parameter is set, the image file is converted with no change in height.

optional_parameters.name: quality
optional_parameters.description:
**Quality** can be from 0-100, smaller quality will reduce the file size.
If no quality parameter is set, then quality is set to 80 by default.
